question: [Rapid] Norsk: Oppgi which integer bin occurs most frequently basert pa histogrammet.

qas.question: [Rapid] Norsk: Oppgi which integer bin occurs most frequently basert pa histogrammet.
[Practice] Deutsch: Gib how many samples were used in total anhand des Histogramms an.
[Check] Portugues: Informe how many entries fall inside the modal bin com base no histograma.
